body_html: @pobingwanghai Could you provide more info as @ma0ho does in the template? It would be much easier for me to debug the problem if you could offer a reproducer too. I guess the OOM error is probably an intended behavior or another issue. But it would be nice if you can offer more info first so that I can have a look. Thank you!
